mil.emp3.api.listeners

Interface IEventListener<T extends IEvent>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - An object the is derived from IEvent.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICameraEventListener, IContainerEventListener, IFeatureDrawEventListener, IFeatureEditEventListener, IFeatureEventListener, IFeatureInteractionEventListener, ILookAtEventListener, IMapFeatureAddedEventListener, IMapFeatureRemovedEventListener, IMapFreehandEventListener, IMapInteractionEventListener, IMapStateChangeEventListener, IMapViewChangeEventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IVisibilityEventListener

    public interface IEventListener<T extends IEvent>
    This interface defines the base of all event listener interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onEvent(T event)
      This method must be implemented by an object class to handle T type events.

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(T event)
        This method must be implemented by an object class to handle T type events.
        Parameters:
        event - An event class that implements the IEvent interface.
